name: Ethan Daniels
text: It should be lesson 1 on day 1 to cut a pizza. It takes the bare minimum of skill and effort. And yet still, I‚Äôve ordered this places‚Äô pizza for 6 months straight and I can‚Äôt get a pizza cut through to save a life. Hardly even perforation on the cheese.

name: Tammy DeRooy
text: Fast friendly service, knowlegable staff and when we arrived our food was JUST out of the oven and in boxes. Everything had GREAT taste.

name: Norma Luna
text: Took too long to get our order. Too many orders in front of us. Other then the food was very good.

name: Tina Matheu
text: Forgot my wings but they quickly got them made for me and apologized. Food was all hot and tasty.

name: zardulu hanasi
text: Got this pizza from our local hungry Howie's in Holland, Mi.  It appears the dough didn't rise, so it was super flat and hard.  Called to complain in a super polite way, and was told rudely that's just how their pizza is.  I've had lots of Hungry Howie's but never had pizza like this before.

name: Kathryn Belin
text: Staff was nice.  Just really busy inside the store.

name: Ken DeJonge
text: Ordered 7 pies on Sunday when they opened. Was promised they would be ready in 20 minutes which they were and all 7 correct and tasted great! Friendly staff too! You guys rock!

name: Tricia Carter
text: The food is ALWAYS fresh, hot and ready when I get there on my way home. Never disappointed. Recently discovered their buffalo, amazing!!

name: Chris Leonardo
text: Love the food and the service!!  A landmark of pizza in Ottawa County!!  Always puts a smile on my face.  üòÅüòÅüòÅüòÅüòÅ

name: Caleb Teachout
text: Worst pizza I have ever had. The entire bottom portion of the box was flooded in grease and the crust was soggy because of it. It soaked through the box onto my table.

name: Adam Zwagerman
text: I normally just get the meal deal number one. Sometimes you can get a good pizza that just came out of the oven. But still it's decent pizza for 6 bucks.

name: Flamer Demon
text: Such a nice place and there foods great. But what makes them the best is i had ordered a pizza and they messed up on the crust flavor wrong. So they remade it and gave us the pizza they messed up on for FREE they also gave a free cinniman bread or Howie bread card for the next time we go there. Love this place so much! 10000/10

name: Nathan Schout
text: Quick, tasty pizza.

name: Anthony Langley
text: Good, cheap, and fast. Never really had a bad experience at this location.

name: Jesse Eaves
text: Delicious Pizza and flavor!

name: Sophia Grey
text: We eat here every week and it is great pizza every time

name: Cindy Moore
text: Friendly people great pizza !

name: Brady
text: Really good for chain store pizza! Staff is nice and always clean and my order is always right.

name: Tessa Rush
text: Great food and friendly service!

name: Salad Yes
text: Really good gluten free options. The best I've ever had.

name: Avery Molnar
text: I don't enjoy pizza very much.

name: Maria Hunter
text: Nice people, usually behind when it gets busy though.

name: Philip
text: Great pizza with many options. The breadsticks are basically drinking garlic as of recent but I'm sure some people like it this way

name: Andrew Hanson
text: Managers and gen manager need to be fired. Calling a customer out and insulting them is horrible customer service. People in Zeeland are racist and rude, stay away!

name: Samantha Jones
text: Great pizza and service!

name: fateric007
text: My sub was delicious. Would eat here again.

name: Jeff Jones
text: Ordered a pizza online and the time given was 40 minutes. I showed up 50 minutes later and stood in line for another 15 before being told my pizza wasn't even in the oven yet. I left because I didn't have time to wait. ‚Ä¶More

name: Judy Lynema
text: Loved it. Picked it up myself. Me and the grandkids ate 2 whole pizzas

name: Paula Steenwyk
text: Online order with pick up!  Alwayd easy!

name: T Gilbert
text: They got her order wrong we had to wait. the manager was not very nice about it he said it was my fault if she wouldn't look at our records she would have known that I order the same thing every time so I know I said the right thing but she didn't care . and they didn't do anything to make it up to us

name: Adam Rozeboom
text: their flavored crust is delicious.  I live out of the area for a long time, and would always get Hungry Howie's when I was back in town.  By far the best pizza chain I have had.

name: Chris Driy
text: Super slammed tonight buy everybody was working hard!!  Thanks for supper!

name: 5lleighl16
text: Pretty much my favorite place to get pizza and a few of the other items they have on their menu. I few times I had to wait a few minutes to get my order, but most of the time I'm in and out. I use their online website and app to order and it makes the process so much easier. Great food!

name: Melissa Yates
text: It's a pretty nice place. Good pizza

name: Bruce Sutherland
text: Always on time and great service

name: Samantha Reed
text: Best customer service even with it being close to closing.

name: Orion Yant
text: Good

name: Jonathon Stewart
text: Good pizza. Fast service

name: Staci Kouw
text: We order on a regular basis and all their delivery drivers are very friendly but the one we had tonight had excellent customer service skills. He even opened the door for me to go back inside because my hands were full, instead of just saying have a good night and walking away.

name: Josh Taytay
text: Its cheap hit pizza

name: MD Bonifasio
text: Pizza was a little cold in the center üòî

name: steve hilton
text: They have good pizza. Good for the price.

name: Chris Martinez
text: Awesome service and Thank You for the great tasting pizza and bread sticks!!! Would recommend to go get you some pizza and bsticks!!!

name: Dawn Banach
text: Like getting their pizzas!  Always fresh always hot!

name: Brian DeWitt
text: Great pizza! I've been going here for years, and have always been taken care of!

name: Vincent Boileau
text: Really high quality (for a chain) pizza joint. My family and friends order from this location frequently because it's right around the corner from our house. Gets pretty backed up on pickup orders around 6-7p and the lounge is tight so watch out for that!

name: William Rieger
text: Great food and service.   Always friendly and prompt service....

name: Marc Zuverink
text: The delivery guy actually apologized for it being too hot. That's an apology I can live with. These guys rock. Best Hungry Howie's ever!  Keep it up and you'll be inducted to the drivers hall of fame.

name: Day Tripper
text: Super friendly staff!

name: Emanuel Gilleylen
text: Been going here since the beginning! Gr8 staff always friendly$

name: David Dejonge
text: Slow service for the last two weeks.

name: Paula Shivers
text: Guys at counter are quick. Pizza and bread is always hot and delicious!

name: Justin Jelsema
text: We were getting takeout here once a week - tonight we received our pizza and upon opening it up when we got home, it was obvious it was reheated. The cheese fell apart, the pizza was cold even though we picked it up "early", and the slices would not come apart. Very disappointing!

name: Jessica Poisson
text: They have affordable prices . Their pizzas are delicious. Delivery is always timely  The delivery people are always kind  .

name: Ruby Van Huis
text: Hungry Howies is a nice quick bite to eat. Nice pizza!

name: alex pattee
text: Friendly and prompt staff and the pizza is delicious.

name: Manticore
text: A great place to buy a pizza and either go pick it up or have it delivered.

name: MATT HUBBARD
text: Almost an hour late with the order. Forgot an order of breadsticks and never came back with them like they said they would.
